about_the_game:
.

Add Last Viking to your wishlist!


Meet Ragnar the Glorious, a Viking who overslept Ragnarok after a bit too much mead. Now, he must embark on a quest to gather the shattered pieces of the broken world, locate Odin and Thor, and steer time back on its fated course.

.

Assisted by the Valkyrie, our Viking sets sail on raids along the colossal serpent Jormungandr's spine.

.

There, he battles a variety of mythical creatures from Scandinavian lore, builds lands, and gathers experience and resources to restore Valhalla.

But he can only achieve this with your help!
Strap on your helmet, grab your battle-ax, and get ready for a wild running on the back of a giant serpent! The fate of the world rests on your shoulders (or, more accurately, on the serpent's back).

.

• Humorous storyline with adorable cat characters
• Battles against mythical foes
• Deckbuilding
• Epic boss encounters
• Merge lands and weapons
• Various heroes to manage and upgrade
• Loops on the Serpent's back and loops of great gameplay
